(online) Most Entertaining Award: Amersham Best Regional Music: GUS Band Best Soloist: Dan Robson (cornet) â€” Easington Colliery
Best Cornets: GUS Band Best Horns: City of Cardiff (M1) Best Euphoniums & Baritones, Best Trombones & Yamaha Best Percussion Award: Whitburn Best Basses: Friary Brass
- Special Online Entertainments Contest, 10' Entertainment Music per Band - open worldwide, separate Sections Championship-Fourth, UniBrass and Youth / CS Draws 1-8 on 27th March & 9-16 on 28th March - Sections take part on 19/20, 26/27 & 5/6/7 March 2021 - Live Judges/Comments (Steve Stewart marks tie-breaker Judge in Championship Section) - Special Prizes/Awards in all Sections & 'The Best Overall Region'
"Battle of the Regions" Leaderboard: Winner: Yorkshire - 17.76 runner-up: Scotland - 18.29 3rd: 'Rest of the World' - 18.36 4th: Europe (continental) - 18.96 5th: Northern Ireland & Ireland - 19.21 6th: Wales - 20.57 7th: Midlands - 22.11 8th: North & North West - 22.40 9th: London & South - 22.50 10th: West of England - 25.16
